column1: Description: International resource flows to and from developed countries
Units of measure: constant 2012 US$ millions

Source: Development Initiatives calculations based on numerous sources. Development finance institutions: Development Initiatives calculations based on a review of DFIs' annual reports (with flows reported as ODA or OOFs subtracted). Foreign direct investment: OECD and national sources (see Foreign direct investment in developing countries indicator). Disbursements and capital and interest repayments on official development assistance and other official flows: OECD DAC. Remittances: World Bank Migration and Remittances Factbook.
